description:
Luffy and Usopp battle to a brutal standstill in a heartbreaking duel between men who once called each other family. Can the Straw Hats find the strength to carry on without their sniper?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy VS Usopp! Butsukaru Otoko no Iji
Luffy contre Usopp ! Le choc entre deux hommes obstinés !
Luffy vs. Usopp! Collision of Two Men`s Pride!
Rubber contro Usopp: una questione d`onore
Луффи против Усоппа. Воля сражающихся мужчин
لوفي ضدّ أوسوبّ! صدام بين فخر رجلين!
ทิฐิลูกผู้ชายที่ไม่ลงรอย ลูฟี่ปะทะอุซป
ルフィVSウソップ! ぶつかる男の意地
